column1: look what the cat dragged in
remind me at three oclock to turn on the oven
tell me at ten to five to wash the clothes
get me to blow off some steam
remind me to thank you at midnight
set a reminder for my books at five tomorrow morning
can you get me to collect the dog tomorrow morning
tell me to water my plants every day after work
remind me to have a shower on a weekly basis
what is the funniest thing you can say
tell me a joke about sharks
give me a star wars joke
do you know any good jokes
dont ever talk to me again
tell me when the titanic sank
i come with knives and agony
how do I tell someone I dont want a conversation
say i cant see in german
